trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Hospeda uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that indicate binary state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> classe é um tipo especializado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> classe usada para logicamente células de host que indicam o estado binário.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> possui um tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> em cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> que faz interseção com ele.

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Cada célula fornece uma interface de usuário (UI) que é semelhante a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de classificação padrão para esse tipo de coluna é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>.

trans-unit.source: Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os valores de célula da caixa de seleção destinam-se para armazenamento, como qualquer outro dado ou para executar operações em massa.

trans-unit.source: If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja responder imediatamente quando os usuários em uma célula de caixa de seleção, você pode manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, mas esse evento ocorre antes de atualizar o valor da célula.

trans-unit.source: If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar do novo valor no momento do clique, uma opção será calcular qual será o valor esperado com base no valor atual.

trans-unit.source: Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to respond to it.
trans-unit.target: Outra abordagem é confirmar a alteração imediatamente e manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento responder a ele.

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Para confirmar a alteração, quando a célula é clicada, você deve tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> value.
trans-unit.target: No manipulador, se a célula atual for uma célula de caixa de seleção, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método e passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> valor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> to mark which employees are out of the office.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> para marcar os funcionários que estão fora do escritório.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> tópico de visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: When you derive from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn" /> and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Clone" /> method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.
trans-unit.target: Quando você deriva de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn" /> e adicionar novas propriedades para a classe derivada, certifique-se de substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Clone" /> método para copiar as novas propriedades durante operações de clonagem.

trans-unit.source: You should also call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Clone" /> method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.
trans-unit.target: Você também deve chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Clone" /> método para que as propriedades da classe base são copiadas para a nova célula.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn" /> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn" /> com o estado padrão.

trans-unit.source: Using this default constructor is equivalent to supplying an argument of `false` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Usar o construtor padrão é equivalente ao fornecimento de um argumento de `false` para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> construtor.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display check boxes with three states; <see langword="false" /> to display check boxes with two states.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para exibir caixas de seleção com três estados, <see langword="false" /> para exibir caixas de seleção com dois estados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn" /> and configures it to display check boxes with two or three states.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn" /> e a configura para exibir caixas de seleção com dois ou três estados.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa a coluna, definindo as propriedades a seguir.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valor

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property initialized to the `threeState` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> com seus <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> propriedade inicializada para o `threeState` o valor do parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `threeState` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `threeState` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate?displayProperty=nameWithType> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate?displayProperty=nameWithType> se `threeState` é `true`; caso contrário, `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo usado para criar novas células.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> depois do qual todas as outras células na coluna são modeladas.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell" /> instância.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: Os construtores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> classe inicializar esta propriedade recém-criado para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>.

trans-unit.source: Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: Alterar as propriedades do modelo de célula não afetará imediatamente a interface do usuário (UI) de células existentes da coluna.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method).
trans-unit.target: Essas alterações são aparentes somente depois que a coluna for gerado novamente (por exemplo, ao classificar a coluna ou por meio de uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> to mark which employees are out of the office.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> para marcar os funcionários que estão fora do escritório.

trans-unit.source: The cell template is used to apply the same color to all cells in the check box column.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de célula é usado para aplicar a mesma cor para todas as células na coluna de caixa de seleção.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> tópico de visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is not of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade foi definida como um valor que não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da célula padrão da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> a ser aplicado como estilo padrão.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values:
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> retornados por essa propriedade tem os seguintes valores de propriedade inicial:

trans-unit.source: `DataGridViewCellStyle` property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade `DataGridViewCellStyle`

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: Valor padrão

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate?displayProperty=nameWithType> Se o inicial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> é o valor da propriedade `true`; caso contrário, `false`.

trans-unit.source: These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Esses valores de substituem o valor especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle, mas podem ser substituídas por outras propriedades de estilo de célula.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Estilos de célula no controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value of `false`, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade tem um valor de `false`, alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> valor da propriedade `true` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> tem um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>, alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> valor da propriedade `false` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> para `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <see langword="false" />, which appears as an unchecked box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor subjacente correspondente a um valor de célula de <see langword="false" />, que aparece como uma caixa desmarcada.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as a <see langword="false" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa um valor que as células nessa coluna tratarão como um valor <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedades determinam os valores associados desses estados conforme elas ocorrem na fonte de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> propriedade do objeto célula retornada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibida.

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> to track the status of office lighting.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> para acompanhar o status de iluminação do office.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A> property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> property associates "unknown" to indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOff" `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOn" `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedade associa "desconhecido" para indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the check box cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a aparência de estilo plano das células da caixa de seleção.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> value indicating the appearance of cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> valor que indica a aparência das células na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Standard" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Standard" />.

trans-unit.source: To display the check box cells using visual styles, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.System> and call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir as células da caixa de seleção com estilos visuais, defina essa propriedade como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.System> e chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> propriedade do objeto célula retornada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibida.

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> to mark which employees are out of the office.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> para marcar os funcionários que estão fora do escritório.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> tópico de visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or <see langword="null" /> cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor subjacente correspondente a um valor de célula indeterminado ou <see langword="null" />, exibido como uma caixa de seleção desabilitada.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as an indeterminate value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa um valor que tratarão as células nesta coluna como um valor indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedades determinam os valores associados desses estados conforme elas ocorrem na fonte de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedade do objeto célula retornada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibida.

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> to track the status of office lighting.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> para acompanhar o status de iluminação do office.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A> property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> property associates "unknown" to indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOff" `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOn" `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedade associa "desconhecido" para indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as células da caixa de seleção hospedada permitirão três estados de verificação em vez de dois.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the hosted <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell" /> objects are able to have a third, indeterminate, state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell" /> hospedados puderem ter um terceiro estado, indeterminado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The indeterminate state can be useful, for example, when you do not want to set a default value in the check box.
trans-unit.target: O estado indeterminado pode ser útil, por exemplo, quando você não quiser definir um valor padrão na caixa de seleção.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> propriedade do objeto célula retornada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibida.

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value of `false`, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade tem um valor de `false`, alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> valor da propriedade `true` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> tem um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>, alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> valor da propriedade `false` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> para `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> to track the status of office lighting.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> para acompanhar o status de iluminação do office.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A> property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> property associates "unknown" to indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOff" `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOn" `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedade associa "desconhecido" para indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve a coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que descreve a coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <see langword="true" />, which appears as a checked box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor subjacente correspondente a um valor de célula de <see langword="true" />, exibido como uma caixa de seleção marcada.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing a value that the cell will treat as a <see langword="true" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa um valor que a célula tratará como um valor <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedades determinam os valores associados desses estados conforme elas ocorrem na fonte de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> propriedade do objeto célula retornada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibida.

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> to track the status of office lighting.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> para acompanhar o status de iluminação do office.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A> property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> property associates "unknown" to indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOff" `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> propriedade associa "turnedOn" `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> propriedade associa "desconhecido" para indeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate" /> é <see langword="null" />.
